register.title: Register
register.name: Name
register.emailDescription: Email to receive alerts. It doesn't need to be the google account email.
register.nameMinLenghtErrorMsg: Name length should be at least 3 characters.

security.title: Security
security.emailConfirmedText: Your email has been already confirmed.
security.emailNotConfirmedText: Your email has not been confirmed. You will not receive alerts until the email is confirmed.
security.logoutAllDevicesText: You will be logged out of all devices.
security.deactivateAccountText: You will deactivate your account and no longer receive alerts.
security.deleteAccountText: Remove your account and all your data from the platform.
security.successMessageEmailSent: A confirmation email was sent to your email.
